title: Proslide Studio: PPt Maker
description: Proslide Studio is a web application designed to simplify the process of creating professional and visually appealing PowerPoint presentations. The application provides a user-friendly interface that allows users to easily create, edit, and customize their presentations with a variety of templates, themes, and design elements. Proslide Studio also includes features such as drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, and integration with popular cloud storage services for seamless access and sharing of presentations.
tech: Canvas API for slide design and rendering
Cloud Storage APIs (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox) for file management and sharing
